refnamediv.refpurpose: Maximum length of extra2 in header/footer

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Specifies the maximum permitted length of the extra2 part of the man-page part of the .TH title line header/footer. If the extra2 content exceeds the maxiumum specified, it is truncated down to the maximum permitted length.

The default value for this parameter is reasonable (perhaps too liberal) but somewhat arbitrary. If you are processing pages with long "source" infromation, you may want to experiment with changing the value in order to achieve the correct aesthetic results.
